catalog_info.title: Probability Theory and Applications I
catalog_info.notes: A weekly 90-minute lab. Offered jointly with the School of Public Health as BIO230.
catalog_info.description: Axiomatic foundations of probability, independence, conditional probability, joint distributions, transformations, moment generating functions, characteristic functions, moment inequalities, sampling distributions, modes of convergence and their interrelationships, laws of large numbers, central limit theorem, and stochastic processes.
